Class LimgraveDog

java.lang.Object
game.engine.actors.Actor
game.characters.enemies.dogs.LimgraveDog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Resettable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GiantDog, LoneWolf
public abstract class LimgraveDog
extends Actor
implements Resettable
Abstract class for all limgrave dogs characters.
Author:
Ho Seng, Harshath Muruganantham
See Also:
